scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run migrate
scripts.migrate:dev: npx truffle migrate --network dev --reset | tee deployments/deploy.dev.log
scripts.migrate:bsc-local-testnet: npx truffle migrate --network bsc-local-testnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.bsc-local-testnet.log
scripts.migrate:bsc-local-mainnet: npx truffle migrate --network bsc-local-mainnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.bsc-local-mainnet.log
scripts.migrate:bsc-testnet: npx truffle migrate --network bsc-testnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.bsc-testnet.log
scripts.migrate:bsc-mainnet: npx truffle migrate --network bsc-mainnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.bsc-mainnet.log
scripts.migrate:eth-local-ropsten: npx truffle migrate --network eth-local-ropsten --reset | tee deployments/deploy.eth-local-ropsten.log
scripts.migrate:eth-ropsten: npx truffle migrate --network eth-ropsten --reset | tee deployments/deploy.eth-ropsten.log
scripts.migrate:eth-local-rinkeby: npx truffle migrate --network eth-local-rinkeby --reset | tee deployments/deploy.eth-local-rinkeby.log
scripts.migrate:eth-rinkeby: npx truffle migrate --network eth-rinkeby --reset | tee deployments/deploy.eth-rinkeby.log
scripts.migrate:arbitrum-testnet: npx truffle migrate --network arbitrum-testnet --reset | tee deployments/deploy.arbitrum-testnet.log
